Reviews.Title: “Good property in great location”
Reviews.Author: honeybomb67
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were looking for a less expensive hotel in OC for a weekend, which is sadly very hard to find. The Crystal Sands was a *little* more than we wanted to pay, but the location was so good, we couldn't pass it up. We were pleasantly surprised by the property - the room is a great size, lots of channels on the TV which we discovered as we were leaving thanks to the channel listing, very clean, chairs to sit on outside of your room. The cons are the off-site parking, but it's not a HUGE deal considering you should have some expectation of walking in OC; and the water pressure was non-existent. It was like a gentle rain. Which is nice, except you've just gotten out of the Atlantic Ocean and maybe want a power wash. However, those are mainly trifles, but they are worth mentioning. We were really grateful to check into our room early as well. Would definitely stay again. It's a fantastic location.

Reviews.Title: “I am PICKY and didn't have any major issues...”
Reviews.Author: Jetavenner
Reviews.Content: I was terrified to stay here after reading some of the reviews. First I will say, the staff here is amazing. AMAZING. Everyone was kind, helpful and professional. A gentleman that was in maintenece (or similar) saw me walking up the steps and stopped what he was doing and grabbed my bags and carried them up to my room...and then went down to my car and helped my husband bring the rest of the bags up. Again, I am a VERY picky person and people often hate going places with me because I constantly send food back at restaurants and complain if things aren't perfect...and this place was perfectly fine. The room was clean. They did use quite a bit of fragrance / air freshener and I am pregnant...so I am little sensitive to smells...but it cleared out after a couple minutes. The TV was brand new looking (the slim flat panel kind). The only cons...I personally didn't find the beds to be comfortable. And there aren't any elevators...so it was a lot of steps to our room on the 3rd floor which is tough with babies and toddlers and being pregnant. Also...a couple people have commented about the parking...it is NOT a big deal at all. Don't let that discourage you from staying here...it's silly. This motel is SO close to everything you don't need your car anyway! And when you do...if you have to park in their secondary lot (which is assigned...it isn't fend for yourself or first come first serve) its right around the corner!!! I had NO problem walking there...with my kiddos. I would absolutely consider staying here again. It is VERY competitively priced. And all of the rules that people have complained about....I am grateful for!!! These are all very clearly spelled out. Read them before booking. I'm glad that we were able to find an affordable place that wasn't run like a frat house. LOL

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, convenient, affordable”
Reviews.Author: Chelsea H
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I were looking for a nice place to stay for a quick getaway to OC and the Crystal Sands Motel fit the bill. Got to check in a few hours early which meant more time to enjoy the beach. Checked out a few minutes late and the motel didn't seem to mind. Very helpful workers at the front desk. We asked a gentleman at the front desk about getting around the city and he was happy to answer our questions. ALL I ask of a hotel or motel is that it is clean. It was. No old sand on the floors, windows and mirrors wiped off, new sheets and pillow cases... And there was a fridge to keep our beer cold and a nice flat screen TV. The basic necessities for a reasonable price. Decent amount of outlets in the room and the air conditioner worked well. Right around the corner from the motel is the beach/boardwalk. It was great not having to lug our beach towels, chairs, umbrella for blocks and blocks. My only complaint was the parking, which wasn't even that big of a deal. Since there is such a small parking lot in the front of the motel, they provide an extra lot about two blocks away near a mini golf course that certain guests are assigned to. I guess those that book their rooms a bit in advance get the better parking. If I go back to Ocean City for a quick and cheap getaway, I would definitely consider the Crystal Sands again. So many hotel reviews mention sketchy management and rooms used by frat boys on spring break that haven't been cleaned since. Crystal Sands did us no wrong.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Summit Point, West Virginia, United States
Reviews.Title: “The room smelled like moth balls”
Reviews.Author: TsR45
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for...this place reeked of moth balls and old people. It was quite overpowering. The a/c worked fantastic and the staff were nice. Won't go back because it smelled so bad! Also, could see greasy spots on headboards of beds were previous guests layed their heads....gross! Could be a little cleaner. Beds were very comfortable!

Reviews.Title: “OK, it's a cheap beach hotel. We came for the beach, not an expensive room!”
Reviews.Author: Larry41onebay
Reviews.Content: I was worried my wife would not approve my frugal pick. And I honestly was hoping for more, but we came 2 days before the 4th of July, the busiest weekend in Ocean City and it was clean and comfortable. Just what we needed and we actually ended up happier with the whole area and saving money on our room made the stay all the more pleasant. Thanks OC.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place, Great Manager...”
Reviews.Author: bmcgurl
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a few nights, rooms were always spotless when we got back from the beach, manager doesnt put up with rowdy teens and was great to deal with....

Reviews.Title: “Excellent rooms and service for the money”
Reviews.Author: Ashlynnkilgo
Reviews.Content: We stay here every year for cruizen ocean city they provide very clean rooms and excellent customer service at very affordable rates... Definately a good motel experience at a very convienent location.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: geewillie
Reviews.Content: Have stayed three years in a row for a week each time. Management has always been very nice and friendly. Rooms have been clean, housekeeping very accomodating. Rooms are plain but my daughter and I don't spend too much time in the room. As a single parent on a family vacation I appreciate no tolerance for late night visitors or partying in rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Don't go here!”
Reviews.Author: Jill C
Reviews.Content: Poorly managed, mediocre maid service, unpleasant customer service, sub-standard rooms - need I say more? Go ANY place else than this!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible place!”
Reviews.Author: Jacole829
Reviews.Content: Went down around senior week and I'm 21 years old and in the military and was told no alcohol in the room and was treated like an 18 year old In high school. Tried coming back to the room after 9 and was interrogated by the "security" gut and he had to check my I'd. I was also told my guest couldn't come back in my room because there are no guests after 930. Ive never been so disrespected and treated like a kid. I would never suggest or stay near this place. It is sketchy and unprofessional.

Reviews.Title: “needs better maintenance”
Reviews.Author: Sp_trips
Reviews.Content: Pros: Great location, affordable, Very nice staff, spacious room Cons: small parking lot odor in room Dirty towels& sheets Rust inside fridge Dated decor No pool Thought this would be a nice place to enjoy a birthday weekend however we were greeted by a disgusting odor in the room. We went to walmart to buy some fresheners which helped a little. When we returned we decided to bathe before bed, the bathroom was clean however the towels were dingy.So we tried to ignore that and get some rest. I pulled back blanket to find dirty sheets underneath. I guess that was the last straw so we slept on top of the blanket and checked out the first thing in the morning. Due to the no refund policies we ended up losing the money for that & paying for two nights at another hotel. This is a decent place to stay if you aren't planning on being inside the room Much. However, I wouldn't suggest this place to clean-freaks like myself or families with children. WARNING: bring your own towels and sheets just in case

Reviews.Title: “I had a wonderful time”
Reviews.Author: cprohias
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Crystal Sands and really enjoyed it. The rooms were clean and well kept. The staff was super nice and helped me in ideas of what to do and where to eat. I love the location and walking distance to the beach. Parked the car and did not return until it was time to leave my trip. I would stay there again~

Reviews.Title: “Human urine on sheets and mattress, owner did not care.”
Reviews.Author: universityhair
Reviews.Content: Checked in and took kids to put them to sleep. Pulled out couch bed to find human urine all over sheets and mattress. Owner wouldn't even get out of his chair to come look at it. Sent a parking lot security employee to put a thin mattress cover on it. Disgusting, like I'm gonna let my two and three year old children sleep in somebody's urine. I was responded to in a rude and completely unprofessional manner. Do not stay here it is a dirty motel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Motel”
Reviews.Author: lulu60795
Reviews.Content: I was really pleased with the Motel, a great find! The location is perfect, very close to the beach for an affordable price. Room was bright and clean. The staff are lovely, the girl at the desk was very friendly and helpful. I will definitely be staying here again

Reviews.Title: “Hated it !”
Reviews.Author: cheapowned
Reviews.Content: This is one of the cheapest motels/hotels in Ocean City and I regret not paying a few extra bucks for a better one. This motel is right behind a night club parking lot. Someone urinated by our window and the air conditioning blew it into our first floor room. We had 5 people in a room and it was really really small. Flies and mosquitoes were flying around our room the whole time. The parking lot is in front and very tight. The young girl I spoke to on the phone was polite and I asked her if there was a sofa bed in the room she said yes and called me back later to tell me there isn't one. She also told us when we got there that there was additional parking in the back and we got yelled at because it is only parking for the club.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Price”
Reviews.Author: PrplePanther
Reviews.Content: Since we are on a very limited budget, I was looking for a motel within our price range, but within reasonable walking distance to the beach/boardwalk. This place worked out great. The man at the front desk was very friendly when I arrived. Check in was easy, and when I got to our room, I was pleasantly surprised. The room was very clean, in a no frills kind of way. Everybody that worked there was very nice to us during our stay. Love the location. Only one block from the beach and the boardwalk, on 17th street. No problems getting across Baltimore Avenue, being most of the traffic is on Coastal Highway. Only problem I had was the parking. Had to park in the secondary parking lot, which is 1.5 blocks away, across Coastal Highway. Other than that, I don't have any complaints. Next time we go to Ocean City, I will definitely be staying at the Crystal Sands.

Reviews.Title: “Very Basic Motel”
Reviews.Author: poca1313
Reviews.Content: This was one of the cheapest motels I could find on the web for a one night stay so I really didn't expect anything fancy. The man at the front desk was very nice. The rooms were small and there was a very strong smell of pine sol or some lemon cleaner. The windows wouldn't open very much. The beds did make my husband and I itch. But the room was very clean, no bugs. The location was great, walking distance to places like dunken donuts, all you can eat buffetts and the boardwalk. The only reason I wouldn't stay there again is there is no pool, which is amust with small kids.

Reviews.Title: “I've never been treated worse in my life.”
Reviews.Author: fratsuck
Reviews.Content: It's getting warm again and I'm planning more trips back to OCMD. I just wanted to let all the 21+ crowd heading to OCMD for drinks and partying that this is the WORST place to go. There were 4 of us last time, 23-29 year old engineers. Unless you are married with kids, you will be under constant surveillance. The guy at the front desk called me a lier when I checked in (maid told me one thing, then he denied she told me that?), threatened to call the cops on us 5... yes 5 times..and it was so stupid that I don't remember all the reasons. One reason was that my reservation was for 2 and there were 4 of us "and I didn't come right out and tell him that". I have traveled around the world and stayed in sketchy hostels with unwelcome arrangements, but never this bad. Granted, we arrived just after "senior week" and I'm sure they were stressed out, but you can't treat all your customers like they are 18. If you have any doubts about my review, email me at fratsuck@gmail.com.

Reviews.Title: “Close ot the beach, but defintely no frills!”
Reviews.Author: MyraSings
Reviews.Content: Wow, I just got back from Ocean City, Maryland and had a brief stay at the Crystal Sands and boy am I glad to be home! Why so happy? Well when my husband first booked the hotel it sounded quaint and I was looking forward to a hotel that was only a block away from the beach and the boardwalk. When we arrived I was shocked at the run down look of the hotel and all the guests and their laundry that were hanging about the outside bannisters of the hotel terraces. Now, I must let you know I am not a beach person, so I was unaware of the common practice of drying your beach towels outside on the hotels railings or your individual terrace. However, it reminded me of those movies depicting the ghettos of the 30's and 40's where immigrants congregated on the porches and stoops outside rather than the inadequate quarters inside. Once inside, the room was clean and did have the necessities. It is a plus that there is a kitchenette with a sink, microwave, refrigerator, and electric stove top. There were dishes and pots and pans, but after I read how each guest must wash their own dishes and found a dish or two with dirt and residue I decided to use paper plates while there. The bed was too soft and the box spring was dirty. Of course I had to check for bed bugs, but we did not experience any problem there. My husband thought I was being paranoid. They did have wireless internet access but they never mentioned it. It wasn't until we asked about it a day and a half after our arrival that I was able to connect with the outside world. The parking lot is tiny. If you go out for the evening try to get back early, there is another lot but it is 2 blocks away. To be fair, the place did grow on me and it was cheap ... comparatively. My dad always said you get what you pay for. There is no elevator, beware if you have alot of stuff and are on the third floor. Yet it did give us a view of the ocean. So, if you want cheap, no frills and close to the beach, give the Crystal Sands a try!

Reviews.Title: “Not too bad”
Reviews.Author: Lisa R
Reviews.Content: I must say that this motel is not as bad as I originally expected. Check-in was easy and fast with a pleasant gentleman at the front desk. The room was a little dim and the window did not open but it was clean and conveniently located a block away from the beach. This motel is away from all of the action and offered a quiet stay while I was in the room. However, I didn't plan to come to the ocean and stay in the room anyways. I would recommend a stay at this motel for a night or two but if you are looking for luxury and amenities you may want to book somewhere else. Overall not too bad~

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay at Crystal Sands”
Reviews.Author: FootballFanTampa
Reviews.Content: My husband and I wanted to stay in Ocean City for one night only....June 21st. We could not find very many hotels/motels that would let us stay for less than three nights, and those that did have one night available were charging an absolute fortune! This motel worked out perfectly. The gentleman at the front dest could not have been nicer. We arrived very early, so our room was not yet available. He took our cell # and called us at the beach when it was ready! The motel is very clean and very quiet. They have rules posted about loud noise and public drinking. The room had exactly what we needed for a night at the beach: a bed, a bathroom, and a sitting area. The staff was constantly visible cleaning and assisting customers. The location was great. We were right across the street from the boardwalk and away from all of the commotion. This part of the beach is great.....nice waves, seashells, and soft sand. We are planning on going back in August and will definitely stay at the Crystal Sands.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: angiejmia
Reviews.Content: Well, it has been a year since my stay at Crystal Sands. My son, friend and I enjoyed the room Great access to boardwalk and attractions. Room clean, a/c work good, front desk very friendly. Short stay,didn't use the efficency kitchen but looks nice. Will be coming in a few days again. Looking forward to my stay, with teenagers- works well so I don't have to drive them everywhere. Price is great for location. We enjoyed very much. Nice to sit outside and enjoy the view of people and so on. No complaints about my music, (kept to a minimum) Thank you Crystal Sands!!! Very satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: “Great Room at an Affordable Price”
Reviews.Author: JerCon
Reviews.Content: What a great place. The girlfriend and I just stayed there for an extended weekend and I must say, I was rather impressed. The rooms were clean, the service was great , the location was perfect; what else could you want. The rooms were the typical motel room design with a nice sized bathroom. The maid service was great (yes the rooms do smell like cleaner like an earlier review pointed out, but I'd rather have that and know that everything is clean)! The gentleman at the front desk was very nice and helpful, he always had a smile on his face. You can't beat the price considering its location, the motel is practically right in the middle of everything. It was just an overall pleasureable stay. I would defiently consider staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Spot for Cruisin'”
Reviews.Author: lillhoneybee
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here for Car Crusin weekend. We had to get an efficiency that was a little more but it was all they had. Most hotels were booked solid. But what a great location! Right on Baltimore Ave. you could sit on the balcony and see all the cars go by. Plus it was located right behind The Party Block, Subway was across the street and Phillips was 3 blocks down so we didn't have to drive anywhere. The room was a good size and very clean. The guy at the front desk was very nice from the time I booked it to when we checked out. No complaints! I would definitely stay here again.
